description.oldValue:
,When you choose a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions, they can now use domain names to restrict file access to specific individuals, or to all individuals from that domain. For example, you can specify "someone@example.com" or "@example.com" and permissions will be restricted based on those parameters.
GA date: March CY2023
Preview date: December CY2022
description.newValue: ,When you choose a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions, they can now use domain names to restrict file access to specific individuals, or to all individuals from that domain. For example, you can specify "someone@example.com" or "@example.com" and permissions will be restricted based on those parameters.
